tool_description: 🚫🤬 Are you concerned about harmful and toxic comments in your online community or platform? Do you want to create a safe and welcoming environment for your users? With ToxDetectAI, you can easily and precisely classify comments as toxic, obscene, insulting, and even containing threats or identity hate.  Our cutting-edge AI models are trained on a massive dataset of text data, ensuring that our API provides accurate and reliable results in over 140 languages. Whether you're running a social m...
